def.dt: :a large building usually with high, thick walls and towers that was built in the past to protect against attack
:a large expensive house Millionaires built their castles along the lake.
:a piece in the game of chess that looks like a castle tower :rook see picture at chess
:a dream, plan, or idea that can never become real usually plural He's just building castles in the air if he thinks he can open a restaurant without any money.
:a small model of a castle or other building that is made with wet sand on a beach
